dict.acceptation: 循环，周期；自行车；时代，一段时间；整套；
周而复始，循环；骑自行车；轮转；

sent.orig: Pullout to failure was performed either primarily or after a 5000-cycle tangential fatigue conditioning exposure.
sent.trans: 对于失败的例子，我们施行了螺钉退出，或者在5000-cycle切线疲劳状态释放后施行了螺钉退出。

sent.orig: The instruction cycle can be divided into ( fetch) cycle and ( execution) cycle.
sent.trans: 指令周期可以分为（提取）周期及（执行）周期。

sent.orig: Automatic cycle surveillance, selectable cycle channel and time.
sent.trans: 自动循环监视，并选择频道循环时间。

sent.orig: Present the macro cycle grouting plan, resolve the flow testing problem of the cycle grouting.
sent.trans: 提出了大循环灌浆方案，很好地解决了循环式灌浆的流量检测问题。

sent.orig: This cycle of input, process, output, and storage is called the information processing cycle.
sent.trans: 输入，处理，输出，和存储的这种循环成之为信息处理循环。
